subject: Re: [sugar] How to test Activities without a XO?
body:
Marco Pesenti Gritti <mpg@redhat.com> schrieb
am 05/29/2007 02:12:25 PM:
> sugar-install-bundle should work if you run it inside the sugar devel

> console (if it doesn't work please open a ticket about it).
> 
> Also you can just unzip the .xo in ~/Activities

Thanks a lot, unziping to ~/Activities did work :-))

Using sugar-install-bundle didn't work. But my sugar-jhbuild
is still in a somewhat broken state, so will try to fix that before I write
a ticket about sugar-install-bundle.

cu andreas
